dmca.title: Dispute with regards to web content: Trade Mark Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Neil Dundas [mailto:n.dundas@bowman.co.za] 
Sent: Tuesday, June 28, 2005 11:02 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Liezl Louw; Warren Weertman
Subject: Dispute with regards to web content: Trade Mark Infringement
Importance: High


Domain name: caa2002.gr
IP: 69.41.243.43

Dispute with regards to web content: Trade Mark Infringement

TO: George Poletes, Legal Counsel 



Dear Sir

We act on behalf of a large international online casino group. Our client
has discovered that the above website may be hosted by 'The Planet.com' and
contains content that infringes our clients trade mark rights. The
particular content under dispute relates to
http://www.caa2002.gr/the-gaming-club-poker-room.htm. 

We require assistance to remove this content as soon as possible. Please let
us know how we can go about this, and in particular whether you can identify
the site owner so that we may take the matter up with him directly.

Please note, we are in the process of completing the requisite notice as
prescribed by your website (http://www.theplanet.com/legal/index.html).
Please however confirm that once in receipt of the proper information, that
you are in a position to remove the content and to disclose to us the
identity of the infringing party.

Faithfully
  

Neil Dundas
Bowman Gilfillan
165 West Street, Sandton, Johannesburg
P O Box 785812, Sandton, 2146
South Africa
Tel:  (+27-11) 669 9610
Fax: (+27-11) 669-9001



Confidentiality Notice : This message is intended for the person/entity to
whom it is addressed and contains privileged and confidential information.
Should the reader hereof not be the intended recipient, kindly notify us
immediately by return e-mail and delete the original message. 

A full list of the directors of the company can be found on the company web
site at http://www.bowman.co.za/directors/
dmca.principal_name: Bowman Gilfillan (for "a large international online casino group")
